text: @realDonaldTrump @CNN Trump you should be focussing on the coronavirus situation… Not your campaign and ratings... you’re a one trick pony… you’ve turned your own opening guidelines into a political crisis... you are a day trader reacting in any moment of time… No plans or safeguards
